headline: Rivian Hires Greg Revelle as Chief Customer Officer
summary: IRVINE, Calif., January 12, 2026--Rivian (NASDAQ: RIVN) today announced the appointment of Greg Revelle to Chief Customer Officer (CCO) of Rivian. Revelle joins Rivian from Revatek, a startup he founded dedicated to enhancing the off-grid outdoor experience through innovative energy storage. He has also held leadership roles at Kohl’s, Best Buy, AutoNation and Expedia, in addition to being a current board member at Cars.com.
